articles.title: Finland ranked happiest country in the world. The U.S. falls to its lowest-ever position - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: The World Happiness Report released on Thursday says the top 20 happiest countries include 14 Western industrial countries, two countries from Latin America and one from the Middle East.
articles.content:
HELSINKI (AP) Finland is the happiest country in the world for the eighth year in a row, according to the World Happiness Report 2025 published Thursday.

articles.description: The former US surgeon general says Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s tenure will not be defined by his work on nutrition or chronic disease but by how he responds to an inexorably increasing number of vaccine-preventable disease outbreaks.
articles.content:
